title: Snezana Wood shows off her incredible bikini body... less than three months after giving birth
text:
Less than three months after giving birth to her third daughter, Snezana Wood has shown off her incredible bikini body.

Taking to Instagram on Wednesday, the 38-year-old former Bachelor star shared a photo of herself lazing in the sun while wearing a black bikini.

Snezana welcomed her youngest daughter, Charlie, with her Bachelor husband of 11 months, Sam Wood, in late July.

Bouncing back: Less than three months after giving birth to her third daughter, Snezana Wood has shown off her incredible bikini body. Pictured with husband Sam Wood

Her incredibly toned body was on full display as she laid back in the sunshine, shielding her eyes with one arm.

Meanwhile, Sam was seen laying alongside her while shirtless and wearing clear framed sunglasses.

The couple happily showed off their bronzed bodies while holidaying with their three kids in Noosa recently.

Baby on board: Snezana only welcomed her youngest daughter, Charlie, with her husband of 11 months, Sam Wood, in late July

Post-baby body: Snezana credited her husband's workout regimen with helping her tone up after welcoming daughter Charlie

In addition to Charlie, the couple are also parents to Willow, two, and Eve, 14, from Snezana's previous relationship.

In an interview with Who magazine in August, Snezana jokingly put her impressive post-baby body down to 'Spanx' control underwear.

'Chasing after a 22-month-old is a great form of cardio!' she said at the time.

Family time: In addition to Charlie, the couple are also parents to Willow, two, and Eve, 14, from Snezana's previous relationship

She also credited her husband's workout regimen with helping her tone up after having a baby.

'I also feel like having a healthy pregnancy and following 28 by Sam Wood has really helped my body after birth,' she added.

'We live a healthy lifestyle at home, but I'm not being too hard on myself or my body. Our focus is on our three girls and I am very content with that.'
description: Less than three months after giving birth to her third daughter, Snezana Wood has shown off her incredible bikini body. The 38-year-old shared a photo of herself wearing just a black bikini.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
